roleset.name: be amazed
roleset.note: MARVEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'marvel' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.3, verbs of emotion. (from marvel.01-v predicate notes)
MARVELING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from marveling.01-j)

example.name: doggerel verse
example.text: ``I am beside myself,'' / I-1've said in moments of heat, / Without *trace*-1 ever bothering / *trace*-1 To marvel at the feat.

roleset.name: express amazement
roleset.note: MARVEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'marvel' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.3, verbs of emotion. (from marvel.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: durn verbs of saying
example.text: [``You could buy at the bid and sell at the offer and make a fortune,'']-1 he marveled *trace*-1.
